name: Dingle
overview:
2012 – The Year Your iPhone Became Self Aware.   On behalf the Indie Game Developer, Dingle LLC, I am requesting a review for the new iPhone puzzle game, Self Aware.   In Self Aware, the player is pitted against a rouge AI named STU (Security-enhanced Turing-complete Universal-program) that has commandeered the player’s iPhone. The player plays through a series of diverse puzzle games to regain control and defeat STU. Self Aware is now available for $0.99 on the iTunes App Store; Self Aware Free, a trial version is also available.

More information, screenshots, and videos are available at http://idingle.com/games/self-aware/   Feel free to download Self Aware for free at the link listed below: APP STORE: http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/self-aware/id506796765?mt=8   Reviews from other sites: 10 / 10 - tapscape.com 5 / 5 – appbite.com 4.5 / 5 – theiphoneappreview.com 4 / 5 – iphoneglance.com 8 / 10 – appstorearcade.com   I look forward to your response and feel free to contact me via email with any questions.   Regards,   Millhouse Brothers Dingle LLC Dingleit@idingle.com
